overview: GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

Youâ€™ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile, Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse through the chat model picker (agent, ask, and edit modes). If you do not yet have access, please check again later.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: This new model will be available to users in:
Visual Studio versions 17.14.19 and later, 18.0.0 and later, in all modes: ask, agent.
GitHub Copilot for JetBrains versions 1.5.61 and later, in all modes: ask, edit, agent.
GitHub Copilot for Xcode versions 0.45.0 and later in all modes: ask, agent.
GitHub Copilot for Eclipse versions 0.13.0 and later in all modes: ask, agent.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Copilot Business and Enterprise administrators must opt in by enabling the GPT-5.2-Codex policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see GPT-5.2-Codex in the model picker.
To learn more about the models available in Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot today.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.

impact: GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.
